name: Electric Eel Shock
text: You can stagger your opponents with jolts of electricity.
prerequisites: Wis 15, Electric Eel Style, Elemental Fist<sup>APG</sup>, Improved Unarmed Strike, base attack bonus +11 or monk level 7th.
benefit: You gain one additional Elemental Fist (Advanced Playerâ€™s Guide 158) attempt per day. Creatures that take electricity damage from your Elemental Fist attack must succeed at a Fortitude save (DC 10 + half your character level + your Wisdom modifier) or be staggered for 1 round. This also applies to creatures that take electricity damage from your Electric Eel Conduit feat while grappled.
